definitions.body: nest, of bird De 22:6, Job 39:27; in sim Is 10:14, Pr 27:8, of nestlings De 32:11, Is 16:2 ([[קֵן מְשֻׁלָּחָ]]), perhaps also [[עִם־קִנִּי]] Job 29:18, but difficult, Che JQ July, 1897, 578 prop [[זׇקֵן]] or [[נִּוִקֻנַי]] (cf. LXX); nest on high, of rock-dwellings Nu 24:21 (JE) Je 49:16, Ob:Ob 4; fig. of Chaldeans’ secure abode Hb Hab 2:9; temple as secure home for Isr. Ps 84:4 (fig. of swallow).
cells, like nests, in Noah’s ark Ge 6:14 (P ; read prob. [[קִנִּים קִנִּים]], so Lag Ol Bu:Urg.255 Di Holz Gunk).
